name: Dolphin
0:
”Alexa ask dolphin boiler what is the hot water temperature”
”Alexa ask dolphin boiler to heat water for one shower”
”Alexa ask dolphin boiler to turn off water heating”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dolphin boiler
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The most comprehensive voice-controlled smart water heating experience with Alexa.
Control DolphinBoiler hands free. Just say it, Dolphin Boiler will do it.

In order to use this skill you must have Dolphin device installed in your water heating system.
For more details visit www.dolphinboiler.com
